title: Is this APP legit?
body:
LolReplay2 

http://leaguereplays.com/

I'd like to see this custom Death recap and champ filter if not against anything.

Thank you.

replies.body: Thaaaaaaat's definitely a [**third party program**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848). I'd be careful using it as it most likely needs to pull real-time data from the game which *could* get flagged as a script of some kind.

Thanks Broporo for the info mate, had to check first, damn them saying "totally legal", well better safe than sorry I say.

Cheers ^_^
